headline: Black Bean and Couscous Salad
name: Black Bean and Couscous Salad
description: This couscous salad recipe with green onions, red peppers, corn, cilantro, and black beans boasts the Southwest tang of a lime-cumin vinaigrette.
recipeIngredient: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Bring broth to a boil in a 2-quart or larger saucepan. Stir in couscous, cover the pot, and remove from heat. Let stand for 5 minutes.
Whisk together olive oil, lime juice, vinegar, and cumin in a large bowl. Add beans, green onions, red bell pepper, corn, and cilantro; toss to coat.
Fluff couscous well, breaking up any chunks. Add to vegetables in the bowl and mix well. Season with salt and pepper. Serve at once or refrigerate until ready to serve.
